attributes.action: make an official protest to the Ambassador to the UK of Ukraine, the UN, and the WTO, against the dismissal of ten managers by a construction company in Ukraine, for speaking Ukrainian.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: OJSC Pavlohradzhytlobud construction company in the town of Pavlohrad, Dnipropetrovsk region of South East Ukraine dismissed ten managers for speaking Ukrainian, something that you would think would be allowed in Ukraine. We ask that the Prime minister officially voices his strongest objection to The Ambassador of Ukraine, the UN, and the  WTO, at this  blatant and basic abuse of Human Rights.
